titleStmt.title: Three decads of sermons lately preached to the Vniversity at St Mary's Church in Oxford: by Henry Wilkinson D.D. principall of Magdalen Hall.
titleStmt.author: Wilkinson, Henry, 1616-1690.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by H.H. [, A. Lichfield, and W.H.] for Thomas Robinson,

notesStmt.note: The second and third decads each have separate dated title page with imprints having "printed by A. Lichfield" and "printed, by W.H." respectively, and separate pagination beginning on 3B1 and 5A1 respectively.
The last leaf bears a vertical half-title: Dr VVilkinsons 3. decads of sermons, with 3. ... sermons in brackets.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
